changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS childs ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, birth_day DATE NOT NULL, firstname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, lastname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, school_id UUID, parent_id UUID, FOREIGN KEY (school_id) REFERENCES schools (id), FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parents (id) );

changeSet.author: mk
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS attendances ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, child_id UUID, entry_date TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL, exit_date TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT entry_exit_dates CHECK (entry_date <= exit_date), CONSTRAINT unique_attendance_entry UNIQUE (child_id, entry_date, exit_date), FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES childs (id) );
